WELCOME: Hello! From where do you want to take the light rail?
FROM_DIRECTION: Ok, you want to leave from {{from}}. To where do you want to go?
FROM_DIRECTION_HELPER: Please say a Bergen Light Rail stop.
STANDARD_RESPONSE: Got it, the next {{tram}} from {{from}} to {{to}} leaves {{departureStop}} at {{departureTime}} towards {{directionStop}}.
FIRST_LAST_RESPONSE: Got it, the next {{tram}} from {{from}} leaves {{departureStop}} at {{departureTime}} towards {{directionStop}}.
ONE_STOP_RESPONSE: The next {{tram1}} from {{from1}} leaves {{departureStop1}} at {{departureTime1}} towards {{directionStop1}}, and the in the other direction towards {{directionStop2}} the {{tram1}} leaves {{departureStop2}} at {{departureTime1}}.
NO_INPUT_2: Please say the name of a Bergen Light Rail stop.
NO_INPUT_3: I couldn't hear anything from you, so I'm ending this conversation. Bye!
ERROR: I'm sorry, I think something went wrong and I have to cancel this conversation. You just have to try again a little bit later.
